name: Lands of Avaronia
description:
COMBAT
Lands of Avaronia uses an oldschool action-combat system. Face your enemies, gain experience by completing in-game chapters and advance your character to higher levels!

Find useful potions which will help you in combat. Use a magic skill unlocked at higher levels to defeat your foes.

Find valuable gear which will make your character stronger and help you in combat.



CLASSIC FANTASY STORYLINE
Play as one of the Mercenaries who is sent on a mission by the Human Kingdom. Help the locals to push back the Orcish Invasion which is threatening to the whole nation.

Meet interesting characters on your way and decide about the fate of Avaronia. Orcs are seeking an ancient artifact which will empower their army. Will you be able to stop them?



TRAVERSE THE LANDS OF AVARONIA
Travel around the world of Avaronia in 10 different chapters available in game. Each of them tells a unique continuous story.

Get to know the whole universe of Avaronia and its unique nations ranging from Humans, Orcs, Elves and more!
